content: विबुध् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {c4c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To wake up, awake; निमील्य नेत्रे सहसा व्यबुध्यत <ls>Ku. 5. 57.</ls> {@--2@} To become conscious. {@--3@} To observe, perceive; find out. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To awaken, rouse. {@--2@} To restore to consciousness; अथ मोहपरायणा सती विवशा कामपधूर्विबोधिता <ls>Ku. 4. 1.</ls>
